title: Cryptic Sounds: No Voices in Your Head
label: Capitol

short.es: EP de archivo y rareza lanzado solo en Japón, que contiene versiones instrumentales, alternativas y en vivo de temas de 'Cryptic Writings'.
short.en: Japan-only archive and rarity EP containing instrumental, alternative, and live versions of tracks from 'Cryptic Writings'.

extended.es: Este EP de rarezas fue lanzado exclusivamente en Japón para capitalizar el éxito de Cryptic Writings. Contiene versiones alternativas, la versión instrumental de 'Trust' y una grabación en vivo de 'A Tout Le Monde'. Aunque a menudo se confunde con un EP totalmente en vivo, es una colección de rarezas de estudio y una pista en directo.
extended.en: This rarities EP was released exclusively in Japan to capitalize on the success of Cryptic Writings. It features alternate versions, the instrumental version of 'Trust', and one live recording of 'A Tout Le Monde'. Although often mistaken for a fully live EP, it is a collection of studio outtakes and one live track.

tracks.title: Evil That Will Remain (Almost Honest Demo)

short.es: Segundo EP en vivo con material exclusivo de giras; continuación de Live Trax.
short.en: Second live EP with exclusive tour material; continuation of Live Trax.

extended.es: Segundo volumen de la serie Live Trax, con grabaciones en vivo exclusivas de las giras de mediados de los 90. Este EP captura a Megadeth en su período más experimental, con material de 'Youthanasia' y 'Cryptic Writings' interpretado en vivo, mostrando la versatilidad de la banda en diferentes contextos.
extended.en: Second volume of the Live Trax series, featuring exclusive live recordings from mid-90s tours. This EP captures Megadeth in their most experimental period, with material from 'Youthanasia' and 'Cryptic Writings' performed live, showcasing the band's versatility in different contexts.

short.es: EP en vivo con grabaciones exclusivas de giras; material raro para fanáticos.
short.en: Live EP with exclusive tour recordings; rare material for fans.

extended.es: EP especial con grabaciones en vivo exclusivas de las giras de Megadeth durante la era 'Youthanasia'. Incluye versiones en vivo de canciones que raramente aparecían en álbumes oficiales, ofreciendo a los fanáticos una perspectiva única de las actuaciones de la banda durante este período creativo.
extended.en: Special EP featuring exclusive live recordings from Megadeth's tours during the 'Youthanasia' era. Includes live versions of songs that rarely appeared on official albums, offering fans a unique perspective on the band's performances during this creative period.

short.es: EP de rarezas, B-sides y covers; tesoros ocultos para coleccionistas.
short.en: EP of rarities, B-sides and covers; hidden treasures for collectors.

extended.es: EP especial que reúne rarezas, B-sides, versiones alternativas y covers que Megadeth había grabado para bandas sonoras y sencillos especiales. Incluye la famosa versión de 'No More Mr. Nice Guy' de Alice Cooper y otras joyas ocultas que raramente aparecían en álbumes oficiales, siendo un tesoro para los coleccionistas.
extended.en: Special EP gathering rarities, B-sides, alternative versions and covers that Megadeth had recorded for soundtracks and special singles. Features the famous version of Alice Cooper's 'No More Mr. Nice Guy' and other hidden gems that rarely appeared on official albums, being a treasure for collectors.

tracks.title: No More Mr. Nice Guy
tracks.lyrics:
(I hear the doorbell ring, and I see the white light)

I used to be a real chill dude, no doubt about it
I used to be the life of the party, now I'm just sick
I used to be so nice, I used to be so cool
But those days are over, I'm breaking the rules

**No more Mr. Nice Guy**
**No more Mr. Nice Guy**

They say I've changed, they say I'm mean
They say I'm cruel, they say I'm obscene
I used to care, but now I don't give a damn
I'm taking control, I'm the one who I am

**No more Mr. Nice Guy**
**No more Mr. Nice Guy**

tracks.title: Breakpoint
tracks.lyrics:
The world is on the brink of disaster
We're rushing toward the edge, moving faster
The system is failing, the truth is denied
We're living a lie, there's nowhere to hide

We're at the **breakpoint**
The point of no return
We're at the **breakpoint**
Watching the world burn

They feed us the poison, they control the mass
They smile in our faces, stab us in the back
We're sleepwalking through life, ignoring the signs
The moment of truth, the crossing of lines

We're at the **breakpoint**
The point of no return
We're at the **breakpoint**
Watching the world burn

tracks.title: Go to Hell
tracks.lyrics:
You took my heart and tore it in two
Betrayed my trust, I believed in you
You stabbed me in the back, left me for dead
Now I'm coming back to mess with your head

**Go to hell**
**Go to hell**

You preach about morals, you talk about grace
But you're nothing but a demon in a pretty face
Your lies and your deceit, they cut like a knife
I'm taking back what's mine, I'm taking your life

**Go to hell**
**Go to hell**

There's no forgiveness, there's no turning back
Just sweet revenge on this evil track
You made your bed, now sleep in the fire
The flames of my hatred are rising higher

**Go to hell**
**Go to hell**

tracks.title: Angry Again
tracks.lyrics:
I was calm, I was cool, I was in control
But the feelings came back, taking their toll
The rage is rising, the pressure is building
I can't contain it, my sanity's yielding

I'm **angry again**
I'm **angry again**

They push me, they prod me, they try to provoke
They think it's a game, they think it's a joke
But the monster is loose, the chains are undone
They'll pay for their sins before the morning sun

I'm **angry again**
I'm **angry again**

My fists are clenched, my teeth are gritted tight
I'm ready to fight, with all of my might
No holding back, no compromise now
The world will feel the fury, I'll show them how

tracks.title: 99 Ways to Die
tracks.lyrics:
I've heard all the stories, seen all the signs
There are **99 ways to die** in these turbulent times
From natural causes to unnatural ends
No matter how you live, death always wins

**99 ways to die**
**99 ways to die**

You can choke on a chicken bone, slip in the tub
Get hit by a bus, or stabbed in a pub
You can overdose on pills, or drown in the sea
There's a method for everyone, eventually

**99 ways to die**
**99 ways to die**

So live every moment, like it's your last one
Because tomorrow might never come, under the sun
Don't waste a second, don't harbor regret
'Cause death's got a price tag, and you haven't paid yet

tracks.title: Paranoid
tracks.lyrics:
Finished with my woman 'cause she couldn't help me with my mind
People think I'm insane because I am frowning all the time
All day long I think of things but nothing seems to satisfy
Think I'll lose my mind if I don't find something to pacify

Can you help me
Occupy my brain?
Oh yeah

I need someone to show me the things in life that I can't find
Can't see the things that make true happiness, I must be blind
Make a joke and I will sigh and you will laugh and I will cry
**Paranoid** will be the death of me, I will be **paranoid**

I will be **paranoid**

tracks.title: Diadems
tracks.lyrics:
In a land of ice and snow, where the winds of winter blow
Stands a castle, dark and old, hiding tales that must be told
A forgotten queen, now insane, ruled by sorrow, ruled by pain
Wearing thorns instead of **diadems**, forever in her tragic dream

Oh, the **diadems**, they shine so bright
Oh, the **diadems**, a miserable sight

The whispers in the empty halls, shattered mirrors on the walls
She dances with the ghosts of kings, the silence only sorrow brings
She searches for a love she lost, regardless of the heavy cost
Her mind is fractured, torn apart, an empty shell, a broken heart

Oh, the **diadems**, they shine so bright
Oh, the **diadems**, a miserable sight

short.es: EP promocional de la era 'Rust In Peace'; un sampler del apogeo del thrash.
short.en: Promotional EP from the 'Rust In Peace' era; a sampler of thrash metal's peak.

extended.es: Lanzado en 1991, este EP fue un sampler promocional de las canciones de su álbum seminal 'Rust In Peace'. Sirvió para destacar los riffs técnicos y la velocidad característica de esta era, capturando a la formación Mustaine/Friedman/Ellefson/Menza en su punto más álgido de destreza musical. No contiene material inédito, sino las versiones de estudio del álbum.
extended.en: Released in 1991, this EP was a promotional sampler of songs from their seminal album 'Rust In Peace'. It served to highlight the technical riffs and characteristic speed of this era, capturing the Mustaine/Friedman/Ellefson/Menza lineup at its peak of musical prowess. It contains the standard studio versions from the album.

tracks.title: Holy Wars... The Punishment Due
tracks.lyrics:
Brother will kill brother
Spilling blood across the land
Killing for religion
Something I don't understand

Fools like me who fly the flag
**Holy wars** are never won
(Instrumental: **The Punishment Due**)

An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth
We kill each other for the truth
Lying to yourselves, you're buying their lies
No one wins when the innocent dies

I'm a soldier, I'm a freedom fighter
I'm a believer, I'm a hellraiser
My enemy is yours, my friend is foe
We all follow where the madness goes

tracks.title: Hangar 18
tracks.lyrics:
Welcome to **Hangar 18**, the government's best kept secret
Inside these walls, the truth is hidden, for those who seek it
Alien technology, bodies, and lies
They're waiting for us, with their glowing eyes

They're planning an invasion, a takeover of the Earth
But the knowledge we've gained will show them what we're worth
We'll use their own weapons, turn the tide of the fight
Against the darkness, we bring the light

(Instrumental break)

I saw the lights, I heard the sound
They brought me here, buried underground
In **Hangar 18**, the secrets untold
It's a story of terror, a future cold

tracks.title: Tornado of Souls
tracks.lyrics:
The walls are closing in on me
The storm is brewing, I can't break free
You said forever, you said till the end
But your lies and betrayal, I can't comprehend

I feel the wind and the freezing rain
It's a **tornado of souls**, and I'm caught in the pain
My heart is shattered, my love is dead
I wish I could erase the words you said

(Instrumental break)

I walk alone on this path of despair
Breathing the ashes, breathing the cold air
I won't look back, I won't shed a tear
I'll face the music, conquer my fear

I feel the wind and the freezing rain
It's a **tornado of souls**, and I'm caught in the pain
My heart is shattered, my love is dead
I wish I could erase the words you said

tracks.title: Five Magics
tracks.lyrics:
I'm a wizard, I'm a king, I can do anything
I wield the power, the might of the ring
I command the elements, the earth and the sky
Witness my strength, before you die

I possess the **five magics**:
The alchemy of fire,
The sorcery of steel,
The conjuring of fear,
The wizardry of glass,
And the illusion of man

With a flick of my wrist, your life fades to black
There's no turning back, there's no attack
You're caught in my spell, under my control
I own your body, I own your soul

(Instrumental break)

I possess the **five magics**:
The alchemy of fire,
The sorcery of steel,
The conjuring of fear,
The wizardry of glass,
And the illusion of man
